Reviews.Title: Good Product...
Reviews.Author: Sonny D.
Reviews.Content: These wires are thick and sturdy, and not thin and flimsy like the other ones. The visual you get through this cable feed is much better and clearer than the thin cable. I believe they are worth the extra money for this set of cables.

Reviews.Title: Plug-and-play
Reviews.Author: S. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Used this to move a camera behind a shed in my yard.  Simple to replace the cable that came with the camera.

Reviews.Title: No Shared Conductor
Reviews.Author: RC "RC"
Reviews.Content: An excellent value.  No need to butt two cables together. More rugged than the cheaper cables that share a conductor.  Negative on the power and ground on the signal.

ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo W-VP2050 AWG22 Video + Power CCTV Cable (50 Meters, 165 Feet)
